Based on your preferences, I would highly recommend "Zulu" (2013) directed by Christian Schmidt.
This historical drama tells the story of a group of British soldiers who arrive in South Africa to help quell the recent Boer War between the Boers and the British.
The main character is Private John Hargreave (Leon) who arrives with his unit at the beginning of the war. He quickly becomes a key figure in the unit, particularly in regards to their relationships with the local population and authorities, as well as their overall strategy and tactics for engaging and conducting operations against enemy forces.
Throughout the course of the war, Private John Hargreave (Leon) and his unit face numerous challenges and obstacles, including both physical and psychological threats posed by enemy forces and other hostile actors, as well as difficulties in terms of securing and maintaining reliable supplies of food and other necessary resources, as well as difficulties in terms of securing and maintaining reliable transportation systems and other necessary means of transport.
